Question: Shenzhen Ulefone Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ulefone

Product: Ulefone Armor 23 Ultra, Armor 26 Ultra, Armor 25 Pro

- Features satellite messaging and all-scenarios imaging system
- Armor 26 Ultra features walkie talkie and satellite messaging
- Armor 25 Pro sports infiRay thermal imaging
- Showcased diverse products at CES 2024 including flagship Armor series, mid-range Armor X series, rugged tablet Armor Pad series, and accessories ecosystem
- Armor 23 Ultra available for purchase via AliExpress with satellite communication feature
Summary_cn:
Ulefone

产品：Ulefone Armor 23 Ultra、Armor 26 Ultra、Armor 25 Pro

- 具备卫星消息和全场景图像系统功能
- Armor 26 Ultra具有对讲机和卫星消息功能
- Armor 25 Pro搭载infiRay热成像技术
- 在2024年的CES展会上展示了多样化的产品，包括旗舰Armor系列、中端Armor X系列、坚固防护平板Armor Pad系列以及配件生态系统
- 可通过AliExpress购买具备卫星通信功能的Armor 23 Ultra产品
